"Time Stopper": A wearable device that allows users to pause time for a short period of time, giving them an opportunity to catch their breath or avoid danger.
"Time Out Machine": A machine that sends users back in time to correct mistakes or change outcomes.
"Time Jumper": A portal that takes users to different points in time, allowing them to experience historical events firsthand.
"Time Saver": A tool that helps people manage their time more efficiently by pausing tasks when necessary and resuming them later.
"Time Controller": A high-tech device that gives users complete control over time, allowing them to slow it down, speed it up, or even reverse it altogether.
